channel.title: Gentle Tai Chi
channel.description: Recent content on Gentle Tai Chi

item.title: Gratitude Tai Chi
item.description: this will eventually have split layout Reach to the front with one hand Reach to the back with the other hand Reach to the side with one hand Reach to the other side with the other hand Reach down Reach up Reach around with both hands Hands come down to Namaste, palms together, thumbs towards your heart corresponds with steps above in order We give thanks for the beauty before us
Something about teacher Welcome to Public Tai Chi
